entry.title: WIND WARNING , Grand Étang
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:38 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grand Étang 12:00 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

Humidity: 83 %
Dewpoint: 1.5°C
Wind: SE 55 km/h gust 88 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 140 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence. High 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then cloudy with showers beginning after midnight. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 140 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 this evening then west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 in the afternoon.
